examples: female child, daughter; Moreschoolgirl; lass, lassie "a five-year-old girl"Moreschoolgirl; lass, lassie a five-year-old girl

definitions.definition: a person's daughter, especially a young one.
examples: he was devoted to his little girl

definitions.definition: a young or relatively young woman.
examples: young woman, young lady, miss, mademoiselle; Moreingénue; lass, lassie; informalchick, gal, grrrl, babe; literarymaid, damsel "he settled down with a nice girl"Moreingénue; lass, lassie; chick, gal, grrrl, babe; maid, damsel he settled down with a nice girl

definitions.definition: a young woman of a specified kind or having a specified job.
women who mix socially or belong to a particular group, team, or profession.
examples: I look forward to having lunch with the girls
his girl eloped with an accountant
